author: jvanzyl
msg: o the required field was not being written out correctly. now it is and an exception is thrown when a required parameter is null.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o perform some minimal validation of the plugin configuration parameters to make sure they are not null when the parameter is required. throw an exception is the parameter that is required is null.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o if an expression evaluates to null then let it let it go through so that it can be examined by the minimal validation now present.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o accounting for a change i just made in maven-core

author: jvanzyl
msg: o throw an exception when there is a plugin configuration problem whether
that be a bad expression or validation problem.
